Entries.{{ModID}}.Brick_Description: Highly durable brick, used in crafting various machines.
Entries.{{ModID}}.ChroBar_Description: A very powerful and strong alloy.
Entries.{{ModID}}.ChroCompound_Description: Mixture of Iridium, Quartz and Prismatic powders, ready to be smelted.
Entries.{{ModID}}.PulvCopper_Description: Large pile of pure copper, must be smelted in an Electric Furnace.
Entries.{{ModID}}.PulvGold_Description: Large pile of pure gold, must be smelted in an Electric Furnace.
Entries.{{ModID}}.PulvIridium_Description: Large pile of pure iridium, must be smelted in an Electric Furnace.
Entries.{{ModID}}.PulvIron_Description: Large pile of pure iron, must be smelted in an Electric Furnace.
Entries.{{ModID}}.PulvPris_Description: Large pile of pure prismatic stones, must be smelted in an Electric Furnace.
Entries.{{ModID}}.PulvQuartz_Description: Large pile of pure quartz, must be smelted in an Electric Furnace.
Entries.{{ModID}}.PulvRadioactive_Description: Large pile of pure radioactive material, must be smelted in an Electric Furnace.
Entries.{{ModID}}.SmeltedFairyStone_Description: Fairy Stone that has been melted down and refined.
Entries.{{ModID}}.Charcoal_Description: A versatile black residue used for smoking and smelting, performs better than coal on small-scale smelting.
